billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Extends for two years the authorization of additional sales and compensating use taxes for the county of Albany
summary: Extends for two years the authorization of additional sales and use tax for the county of Albany from November 30, 2011 until November 30, 2013.

       AN  ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of sales and

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-

    4    (10)  the  county of Albany is hereby further authorized and empowered

   18  county is allocating and distributing the net collections from the coun-
